content:
I was shown a measurereport instance here at the Connectathon with a contained Bundle referenced by the evaluatedresources element and the bundle had with List entries. I was not familiar with the structure and was told it came from Patrick and you...

http://cqm-sandbox.alphora.com/cqf-ruler-dstu3/fhir/Measure/%24care-gaps?patient=denom-cms124-stu3&topic=Preventive%20Care%20and%20Screening&periodStart=2019-01&periodEnd=2019-12

  • I assume this from your team?
  • if so ... why contain the referenced resource in the MeasureReport? why the lists?
